reviewText: good prison movie - from back in the day when convict movies were "real"
So so tv dramas from a bygone era. The prints of these dramas not great but they're watchable and the sound is good. But the programs are nothing spectacular.

Bought this because of my love for Charles Boyer--at first, you don't know if he's a good guy or a bad guy...then you find out (not telling).  Continued to watch the others right away as well...I wanted more--4 just doesn't seem to be enough.  I watched them in 1 sitting and have put many of the Four Star Production sets on my wish list (as well as already getting 2 or 3 other sets).
